channel.title: RS/c
channel.description:
Taking the classic out of rsc. You read it correctly. Tired of doing the same old shit. Runescape 2 and RSC are both runescape. The difference is the major graphics change. [b]The point of this project is to add the current rs2 content into a rsc view and stand point. [/b]
The [b]green[/b] color means the feature has been finished. The [b]orange[/b] color means the feature is in the works. The [b]red[/b] color means the feature has not yet been started. [center][b]Skills[/b][/center] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b] [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img][b]Ranged[/b] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img][b]Magic[/b] [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][b]Prayer[/b] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img][b]Agility[/b] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img][b]Herblaw[/b] Cooking[/b][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img][b]Woodcut[/b] [/quote]
es imposible!!!1

[quote][22:25 16/02/2011] i suggest changing your password too
[22:26 16/02/2011] for in-game? could really careless about that atm
[22:26 16/02/2011] dunno for what
[22:27 16/02/2011] Situati0n:3b6a31b26857149d4b1b890ff86b561aa3bba07c:rein_123@live.com:Server231
[22:27 16/02/2011] they have the entire db
[22:27 16/02/2011] [22:26] <~RLN> you guys did a number on rsca lmao
[22:27 16/02/2011] i guess according to you RLN is a part of it
[22:27 16/02/2011] even though he just joined
[22:27 16/02/2011] that database is old
[22:27 16/02/2011] they have the first 1 that was leaked like 2 months ago
[22:28 16/02/2011] by boid
[22:28 16/02/2011] void
[22:28 16/02/2011] [22:18] <~nade> shlorine
[22:28 16/02/2011] [22:18] <~nade> i dumped sql
[22:28 16/02/2011] [22:18] <~nade> 2 h ago
[22:28 16/02/2011] [22:18] <~shlorine> I dumped it 5min ago
[22:29 16/02/2011] that’s impossible
[22:29 16/02/2011] but tell them nice ry
[22:29 16/02/2011] try
[22:29 16/02/2011] how is it impossible?
[22:30 16/02/2011] becuz they didn’t
[22:30 16/02/2011] lol
[22:30 16/02/2011] if they have access to an exploit on a page where SQL is accessible
[22:30 16/02/2011] then they can dump the db
[22:30 16/02/2011] well
[22:30 16/02/2011] they can’t get into the DB
[22:30 16/02/2011] so it’s impossible
[22:30 16/02/2011] and i’m looking at it right now[/quote][/quote]
Hmm… I Don’t get it? How does this have anything to do with what we said?

Also, the DB was old as fuck, at that point, my password was changed about 3x since the “Server231”. I said it was impossible, and they didn’t hack the DB after. Love you.

On Topic:

Fucking Idiot.

item.title: RS/c
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:41, topic:418637”]Will update first page over the weekend. I have quite a few things done.

-Turn your character into P2P = Buy Card (IRL GP) or Pay GP of x Amount
-Construction will allow you to build a ladder to reach a few extra monsters. Each ladder location will have a red square in the landscape or some sort of object which represents the construction area. The higher the construction level, the higher monsters you can reach.
-Farming will be mainly for herbs and trees and will be timed. You player will be frozen for x amount of time until the farmed item is complete (for herbs). Example : Ranarr seed = 3 minutes of wait. Id like to be able to allow the character to roam around but just aiming for simplicity. Trees will be planted instantly allowing you to chop away until the tree is gone (great for higher trees as you can just train right outside of a bank).
-Batched events, you will be able to select how many items you want to execute with a skill.
-Everything is in mysql allowing for quick and easy customization.

^
These are not done but yet still brainstorming all the concepts of my project.[/quote]

Sounds great! keep posting new updates and thoughts!

Read full topic

item.title: RS/c
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Will update first page over the weekend. I have quite a few things done.

-Turn your character into P2P = Buy Card (IRL GP) or Pay GP of x Amount
-Construction will allow you to build a ladder to reach a few extra monsters. Each ladder location will have a red square in the landscape or some sort of object which represents the construction area. The higher the construction level, the higher monsters you can reach.
-Farming will be mainly for herbs and trees and will be timed. You player will be frozen for x amount of time until the farmed item is complete (for herbs). Example : Ranarr seed = 3 minutes of wait. Id like to be able to allow the character to roam around but just aiming for simplicity. Trees will be planted instantly allowing you to chop away until the tree is gone (great for higher trees as you can just train right outside of a bank).
-Batched events, you will be able to select how many items you want to execute with a skill.
-Everything is in mysql allowing for quick and easy customization.

^
These are not done but yet still brainstorming all the concepts of my project.

Read full topic
